root.name: PClient
root.description: The PClient object is used to initiate network requests to web servers on the Internet. It supports the two most common methods of the Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP), GET and POST, allowing it to communicate with servers as if it were a desktop web browser. Both methods initiate a new network request and return a PRequest object used to track the request and read the returned data.

method.mdescription: The GET method is used to fetch data from a web server.
The POST method is used to submit data to a web server to be processed.

cparameter.cdescription: String: name or IP address of server
int: optional port number to read/write from on the server
